name: Personalised E-learning Recommendation System
description: An AI-powered learning platform that provides personalized course recommendations based on student performance, interests, and learning styles.

name: E-commerce
description: A full-stack e-commerce application with secure authentication, product management, cart functionality, and seamless checkout integration.

name: Real Estate Frontend
description: A modern and responsive real estate website built with React, featuring smooth animations with Framer Motion and a seamless contact form using W3Form.

name: Finance Tracker App
description: A simple and intuitive finance tracker that allows users to add, delete, and manage income and expenses, providing a clear overview of their financial status.

name: Phone Directory
description: A simple contact list application that allows users to save, manage, and delete contacts efficiently.

name: Contact List
description: A frontend application that fetches data from a Contact API and displays a list of contacts in an intuitive and user-friendly interface.

name: Jaquette Storefront
description: A small shopping app made with React as a part of the Odin Project curriculum. Uses routing, state, and various componenets to emulate a shopping experience for users on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
